query.queryText: SELECT "success" = tab.success,"code" = tab.code,"message" = tab.message,"accountName" = tab.accountName,"accountStatus" = tab.accountStatus,"availableBalance" = tab.availableBalance,"averageBalance" = tab.averageBalance,"currencyId" = tab.currencyId,"deliveryAddress" = tab.deliveryAddress,"freezingsNumber" = tab.freezingsNumber,"frozenAmount" = tab.frozenAmount,"lastCutoffBalance" = tab.lastCutoffBalance,"lastOperationDate" = tab.lastOperationDate,"openingDate" = tab.openingDate,"overdraftAmount" = tab.overdraftAmount,"productId" = tab.productId,"toDrawBalance" = tab.toDrawBalance,"accountingBalance" = tab.accountingBalance,"ofical" = tab.ofical,"clabeAccountNumber" = tab.clabeAccountNumber,"idDebitCard" = tab.idDebitCard,"debitCardNumber" = tab.debitCardNumber,"stateDebitCard" = tab.stateDebitCard
